full_summary:
# Public Tender Announcement: Giinuu / Sea Cucumber Survey Services – Haida Gwaii
==========================

I. Title and Reference
------------------------

• **Title (English)**: Giinuu / Sea Cucumber Survey Services – Haida Gwaii
• **Title (French)**: Services de relevé de giinuu/concombres de mer – Haida Gwaii
• **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017258

II. Tender Details
-------------------

* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-14
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-12T13:00:00 (closed)
* **Contracting Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **End User Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada

III. Contract Requirements
---------------------------

A contract is required to provide a vessel to support the deliverables of the Haida Gwaii “Changing Tides” Reconciliation Framework Agreement. The work involves conducting SCUBA dive surveys to gather data on giinuu/sea cucumber size and abundance in remote locations around Haida Gwaii. The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing transportation, sleeping accommodations, meals, dry workspace for data management, and wet workspace for processing giinuu/sea cucumber biosamples
* Conducting surveys in Pacific Fishery Management Areas 1 and 2
* Collaborating with Haida Fisheries Program staff on surveys

IV. Contract Duration and Options
-----------------------------------

The contract is intended to last from contract award through to March 31, 2023, with two 1-year option periods to enable the contractor to provide services on an “as and when required” basis. Notwithstanding the estimated days per year in the cost proposal, the actual start and end dates of each survey will be mutually agreed upon by the contracting parties.

V. Technical Requirements
---------------------------

* Animal and Fisheries Studies
* Data Analysis – Performance of a Survey
* Fisheries Resources Management Services

VI. Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Contact Name**: Walker, Kimberly
* **Email**: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Attachments**: [English][1] and [French][2]
